Another Sonic universe not listed above
1.content: Sonic is about to find himself in another world after the events of [insert recent sonic game here] but what universe does he find himself in?
1.title: Select your world!

One of the parody or oneshot universes

11.title: An Archie Sonic universe

12.title: A cartoon Sonic Universe

125.content:
This one's a doozy. You've got a choice of three different universes!

- Option 1: The Main Sonic Boom universe!
- Option 2: The Mirror Dimension (Green Eggman, Smart Knuckles)
- Option 3: The Alternate Dimension! (Sonic never existed & Lord Eggman successfully takes over Seaside Island)
125.title: Which Sonic Boom universe?

choices: IDW (Assuming that isn’t just game sonics universe)
13.content: Oddly there’s still alot of comics to choose from
13.title: A Different Sonic Comic universe

info.brief_description: Sonic the Hedgehog finds himself in another Sonics world. The rest is what you choose.
info.description:
Sonic from the Games meets another universes sonic? What is this a fan-fic?
Quick rules:
Keep chapters brief to allow for quick reading before a choice, but not so short that it takes them out of the story. 1-3 paragraphs are Ideal.
Don’t turn this into a sexual or fetish adventure, there’s plenty of those interactives up and this is meant to be a break from that.
Romance is okay, but don’t have Game Sonic pursue any relationships.
Never give only one option, atleast provide a “Something else” option and try to use as many options as your account let’s you use.
Please don’t write any sonic characters you aren’t familiar with, it’ll take fans out of it if Fleetway Sonic talks in nothing but British slang or if Bunnie Rabbot has no accent.
That being said, your free to write someone if you think the story gave you a good idea of their personality.
